amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Wildlife Refuge System by $5 million and reduce fossil energy research and development funding by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service for operation and maintenance of the Wildlife Refuge System by $5,million and to reduce funding for the fossil energy research and development under the Department of Energy by a comparable amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 220 (Roll no. 254).
